mainObjective: Explore the mysterious caves beneath Shadowdale, uncover the source of strange occurrences, and stop the awakening of an ancient evil.

plotPoints.title: Entering the Caves
plotPoints.description: The party enters the ominous cave opening, tasked with investigating strange occurrences. They notice ancient carvings and feel an eerie presence.

plotPoints.title: Echoing Whispers
plotPoints.description: As the party delves deeper, they begin to hear whispers echoing through the tunnels, hinting at an ancient presence.

plotPoints.title: Cultist Encounter
plotPoints.description: The party stumbles upon a group of cultists performing a ritual. They must choose to fight or hide and gather information.

plotPoints.title: Natural Hazards
plotPoints.description: The party faces treacherous cave terrain, including a underground river crossing and unstable rock formations.

plotPoints.title: Ancient Guardian
plotPoints.description: The party encounters an ancient construct guarding the deeper parts of the cave. They must defeat it or find a way to bypass it.

plotPoints.title: The Heart of Darkness
plotPoints.description: Reaching the central chamber, the party discovers the cult leader attempting to awaken an ancient evil entity. They must stop the ritual and confront the leader.

plotPoints.title: Sealing the Evil
plotPoints.description: With the cult leader defeated, the party must find a way to reseal the partially awakened entity before escaping the collapsing cave system.

sideQuests.title: Crystal Collection
sideQuests.description: The party can collect rare, glowing crystals throughout the cave for a reward, but each extracted crystal increases the instability of the cave system.

sideQuests.title: Lost Spelunker
sideQuests.description: The party encounters a lost explorer in the caves. They can choose to help them escape, which might provide useful information but also slow their progress.
